DOC.brief_summary: Many people experience pain, tenderness and soreness of joint and muscles, both in sport and working life. Pain killers can provide acute relief of pain, but may not be a feasible solution for all people. Here the investigators examine the acute effect of massage and exercise on induced muscle tenderness (delayed onset muscular soreness).
DOC.brief_title: Acute Effect of Massage and Exercise on Muscle Tenderness
DOC.criteria: working age adults blood pressure above 160/100 disease of the cervical spine
